body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Welcome to Vincenzo's Benzos. My name is Eugene Collins. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Eugene! I'm looking for information on your latest car models.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'd be happy to help you with that! Before we proceed, may I know your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is Heather Howard.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Heather. Could you please provide me with your email address so I can send you more details about our models?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's heatherhoward123@gmail.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Heather. One more thing, could I get your phone number in case we need to follow up?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Certainly! It's six three zero five five five one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you! I'll send over the information right away. If you have any other questions, feel free to reach out.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thanks, Eugene. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Heather. Thank you for your time and have a great day!

body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Eugene Collins and the customer's name is Heather Howard.  The conversation is about Vincenzo's Benzos (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.
